Administrative User

  1. Create administrative user:

    # useradd -m -k /dev/null <USER>
# passwd <USER>
> <NEW-USER-PASSWORD>
> <NEW-USER-PASSWORD (VERIFY)>

  2. Add user to administrative groups:

    # usermod -aG wheel,dhcpcd,network,rfkill,uucp <USER>
